short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Schedule email reminders for solving LeetCode problems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple chrome extension which sends reminder through email to re-solve the Leetcode problem (which you solved by seeing hint or taking help) to see if you really got better at it.
